entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Mono calli does not setup LMF #64073
  • Intrinsify methods of System.Numerics.Vector #64072
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration tests failing on netfx x86 #64071
  • AF: g_TblIndex[ixTbl].m_Token == type in System.Reflection.Metadata.ApplyUpdate tests #64070
  • Pass through diagnostic information for failed calls to IPC WriteDumpAsync #64069
    7.0.0
  • BasicThreading test seg fault in Build Linux x64 release NativeAOT #64060
  • KnownHeader values may change casing of received values #64053
  • ChannelReader.ReadAsync/ChannelWriter.WriteAsync don't return or throw when cancellation token is signaled #64051
    7.0.0
  • TryAddWithoutValidation for multiple values could be more efficient #64049
  • ildasm has problems with non-ASCII characters #64045
  • Process.Modules does not list dynamically loaded assemblies on Linux #64042
  • Blazor WASM does not free memory - possibly a memory leak #64047
  • [API Proposal]: Make AddHttpClient() inject an ITypedHttpClientFactory into instantiated class #64034
  • API Proposal: IPNetwork to support CIDR notation #64033
  • API Proposal: Generic LINQ Numeric Operators #64031
  • How to detect or prevent HTTPS endpoint fallback to Http #64029
  • Auto-vectorization of pointer indirection expr. and explicit layout #64026
  • Reuse JsonSerializerOptions when used with JsonSerializerContext #64025

Closed

  • System.Runtime.InteropServices.Tests is causing large core dumps on macOS #63761
  • UserSecrets should be optional by default #61418
    6.0.x
  • [API Proposal]: System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.StringSyntaxAttribute #62505
    7.0.0
  • Linker tests failing with no space left on device on Linux x64 #60927
    7.0.0
  • Vector<byte>.Count doesn't match the code behavior #64052
  • Inconsistent assembly version for System.Text.Json netstandard2.0 #64003
  • Source generated System.Text.Json serialization uses AOT-unfriendly reflection #63843
    7.0.0
  • ALPN processing on Linux can be improved #58299
    7.0.0
  • Consider using SortedList instead of Dictionary in HttpHeaders #62846
    Future
  • IgnoreNullValues does not work with non-nullable value types #30795
    7.0.0
  • System.Linq support Deconstruct for IGrouping #63919
  • ReadyToRun and Unicode class names #61104
    6.0.x
  • cryptography/security test failures on RHEL9/Fedora 36. #63624
    7.0.0
  • More extensible object and collection converters #36785
    7.0.0
  • `JsonNumberHandling.WriteAsString` doesn't work when serializing `JsonElement` #63735
  • internal sealed class EnumConverter<T>.Read() #63893
  • Another segfault in gc_heap::get_region_plan_gen_num for a frozen object #63906
    7.0.0
  • Segfault in gc_heap::get_region_plan_gen_num for a frozen object #63778
    7.0.0
  • VS2019 Remote debugging: Attach fails on linux-arm with .NET 5.0.2 (Error 0x80131c4f) #47848
    Future
  • PGO assert in Loop Hoisting #63982

PullRequests

Created

  • force extra warmup #64075
    * NO MERGE *, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • RegexNode cleanup #64074
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Throw during renegotiation if there is incomplete received TLS frame #64066
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Enable some browser legs on the extra-platforms pipeline #64065
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Log message of unexpected exception in ThrowsAny #64064
    area-Meta
  • [draft][wasm] InvokeJSFunctionByName #64062
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Add missing handle function enter/return macros #64061
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-maui' #64056
  • [release/6.0] Fix JsonObject constuctor #64055
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Remove spaces from GH labels used by FabricBot #64048
    area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • Move libunwind directories to src/native/external #64043
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Make ILLink validation steps in libs incrementally buildable #64041
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Do not hoist constants if they will not be CSEed #64039
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Ignoring leading dot when comparing cookie domains #64038
    area-System.Net
  • Make ApiCompat.proj incrementally buildable #64037
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Extract SuperPMI into a separate component #64035
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • [release/6.0] Fix OpenSSL version check in GetAlpnSupport #64032
    area-System.Net.Security, test bug
  • Android remove backward timezones #64028
  • adding centralized location to disable library tests #64024
    * NO MERGE *, area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [API Implementation]: System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.StringSyntaxAttribute #62995
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Read the System.GC.CpuGroup settings in runtimeconfig.json #64067
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Sync shared code from aspnetcore #64059
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Performance: Fix Browser Wasm job not being found for dependent jobs #64058
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add StringSyntax attribute to Regex.pattern field #64063
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Fix exception propagation over HW exception frame on macOS arm64 #63596
    area-PAL-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Revert "Temporarily disable coredumps during library testing on macOS (#63742)" #64057
    area-Infrastructure
  • Preserve `OBJ`/`BLK` on the RHS of `ASG` #63268
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add test coverage for frozen objects and GC interaction #64030
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Polish the PR build doc #64036
    documentation
  • Fix dependency in runtime-official.yml #64040
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix Crossgen2 bug #61104 and add regression test #64027
    Servicing-approved, area-crossgen2-coreclr, 6.0.3
  • Update XUnit to 2.4.2-pre.22 #63948
    area-Meta
  • Change OperIsBlkOp test to check for store block operators #60878
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • Exception sets: debug checker & fixes #63539
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix invalid threading of nodes in rationalization #64012
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add ns2.0 support to System.Formats.Cbor #62872
    area-System.Formats.Cbor, 7.0.0
  • Remove Type.MakeGenericType dependency from source generation #64004
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Disable DirectoryLongerThanMaxLongPathWithExtendedSyntax_ThrowsException #64044
    area-System.IO
  • Reduce the memory footprint of HttpHeaders #62981
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] WebSocket tests on NodeJS #63441
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Added support for stepper boundary attribute #63991
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [debugger][wasm] Added support for non user code attribute #63876
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix issues with verify_regions, clear_batch_mark_array_bits. #63798
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix Crossgen2 bug #61104 and add regression test #63956
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix OpenSSL version check in GetAlpnSupport #64023
    area-System.Net.Security, test bug
  • Fix gc_heap::remove_ro_segment #63473
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add ProcessLinkerXmlBase to NativeAOT #63666
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Arm64] Keep unrolling InitBlock and CopyBlock up to 128 bytes #63422
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • 'cmeq' and 'fcmeq' Vector64<T>.Zero/Vector128<T>.Zero ARM64 containment optimizations #62933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Check if the child object is in the heap range before object_gennum #63970
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Check if the child object is in the heap range before get_region_plan_gen_num #63828
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Update StructMarshalling design now that DisableRuntimeMarshallingAttribute is approved #63765
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • JIT: fix up switch map for out-of-loop predecessor #64014
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Fixes a few issues for dprintf on OSX #64076
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Enable QJFL and OSR by default for x64 and arm64 #63642
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add COMWrappers to crossgen #63969
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [WIP]Port MD4 managed implementation from mono/mono #62074
    area-System.Security
  • Delete `GT_DYN_BLK` #63026
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Morph `Vector.Create(0)` to `Vector.Zero` #63821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement NativeLibrary.GetEntryPointModuleHandle #57610
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Add runtime support for `ref` fields #63985
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add CancellationToken to TextReader.ReadXAsync #61898
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Ensure several helper intrinsics are correctly imported and handled #63972
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Trying to fix issue #63788: "NetworkChange.NetworkAddressChanged event leaks threads on Linux #63963
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Implement System.Runtime.CompilerServices.DisabledRuntimeMarshallingAttribute on CoreCLR-family of runtimes/type systems #63320
    blocking, area-Interop-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] JIT/EE interface for getting ABI-info #62893
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Allow CreateScalarUnsafe to be directly contained by hwintrinsics that support scalar loads #62407
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add pmi_path argument to superpmi.py script and use it in the superpmi-collect pipeline. #63983
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Apply changes on wasm using sdb protocol. #63705
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Support chrome debugging using chrome://inspect #63900
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [Group 2] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Abstractions` #64018
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Initial WASI support prototype #63890
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [API Implementation]: Support for Intel SHA extensions #62999
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add JIT support for control-flow guard on x64 and arm64 #63763
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: simple forward substitution pass #63720
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Moved AssemblyName helpers to managed #62866
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Introduce RandomAccess.SetLength #63992
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Fix broken callstacks in interpreter on MonoVM. #60338
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Fixing error after receiving loaded_files = null #63739
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.3
  • [release/6.0] Support Single-file executable in Windows 7 #63533
    Servicing-approved, area-Single-File, community-contribution, 6.0.3
  • [release/6.0] Avoid deadlock with ConfigurationManager #63816
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 6.0.3
  • [release/6.0] Fix OpenSSL 3 reporting an OutOfMemoryException for missing private key #63955
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, community-contribution, 6.0.3
  • [release/6.0] Update SAN test to account for OpenSSL 3 changes #63951
    area-System.Security
  • Remove usage of FEATURE_CORESYSTEM #63850
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • #51371 fixed failing test in iossimulator #63877
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add alignment to mapped field stream #63305
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Fix IsMutuallyAuthenticated on Linux and OSX #63945
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Optimize Math.Round(x, MidpointRounding.AwayFromZero/ToEven) #64016
    area-System.Numerics
  • [API Implementation]: Extend System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86 to support nint and nuint #63594
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: DirectoryInfo.CopyTo / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Update ComputeHash to remove hash allocations for digest authentication #64005
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • issue-22928 Add ImmutableArray Span-based APIs #61196
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Emscripten 3.1.1 bump #63894
    area-Build-mono
  • Improve incremental build times of the libraries subset #64000
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • [Android][libs] Enable Internal.Console.Write in System.Private.CoreLib #63949
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Switch default modules to es6 #62740
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Extra tests for assembly name parser. #64022
    area-System.Reflection
  • NativeAOT: ICustomMarshaller #62921
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Moved AssemblyName helpers to managed (part 2) #63915
    area-System.Reflection
  • Add Match and isMatch ReadOnlySpan<char> overloads as well as Regex protected methods which expose ReadOnlySpan<char> to avoid allocations. #62509
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [LoongArch64] add gc directory for LoongArch64. #63071
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Allow generating Dwarf version 5 #63988
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • PackageValidation runs in no-op incremental builds #23517
    .NET 7.0
  • dotnet build -r crashes with exception #23510

Closed

  • NuGet Credential Provider Plugin Fails to Start #21320
  • Adding net6.0 target framework to existing library breaks project #23520
  • .NET 5.0.211 only, 3.1 project restoring failed with error NU1102 #23471
  • Can't install dotnet-ef 6.0.1 by command line #23435

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove 1.0.5 and 1.1.2 installs from our linux runtimes #23525
    Area-Infrastructure
  • `dotnet watch` test fix search console history #23521
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix version.details entry for System.Commandline #23519
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1563691 #23508
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Block loading the 7.0.100 SDK in 16.11 and below VS and MSBuild versions #23302
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.3xx] Backport Improve console output of `dotnet watch` ⌚ (#23318) #23400
    Area-Infrastructure, Blocked, Area-Watch, 6.0.3xx
  • Better caching for RazorSourceGenerator when SuppressRazorSourceGener… #23419
    Area-AspNetCore, DO NOT MERGE, 6.0.3xx
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #23504
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-20
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Champion "params Span<T>" #1757
    Working Set

PullRequests

Merged

  • Allow optional and empty parameter list #5670

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Exception in AbstractAsynchronousTaggerProvider #58986
  • Create a test for AdditiveSpans changes #58984
  • Code Folding for Additional Types #58982
  • There should be a way to refactor a string literal as a public static readonly string #58981
  • Support C# multiline positional record definition style enforcement in editorconfig #58980
  • Add a feature that we can hide this bar #58979
  • Partial method filled in by source generator still getting red squigglies #58976
  • Creating a new C# class from item template is missing a space between the access modifier and 'class' keyword #58974
  • Visual Studio Debugger cannot see anything that comes from a static import (C#) #58973
  • Remove Unnecessary Usings does not preserve empty line between file scoped namespace and usings inside #58972
  • C# Extract method selects wrong part of code #58971
  • LSP Editor doesn't render documentation comments properly #58966
  • Go To Base on a member with a single base in metadata fails to navigate #58964
    17.2
  • Need VS2022 17.0.5 release notes #58963

Closed

  • Building VB.NET project can report errors with invalid paths when the file path contains a number within parentheses #47790
  • InterpolatedStringHandlerArgumentAttribute("") is not correctly taken into account when the receiver is a struct #58514
    17.1
  • Code style analyzers package doesn't load global config files on Linux #58948
    17.2
  • Cleanup SolutionEventMonitor type #58827
    Next
  • Creating named tuple type synonyms in using not allways allowed #58967
  • IDE0063 "using statement can be simplified" code fix results in invalid code (build error) #58113
    17.2
  • Param-nullchecking doesn't work properly with formatting analyzer #58798
    17.2
  • It looks like some of the OrganizeImports tests are either flaky, or culture dependent when executed on CoreClr #58867
  • DetachedDefinitionItem retains large working sets #57544
    17.2.P1
  • Code Cleanup: Settings revert out of the set and cannot be used #58924
    17.1

PullRequests

Created

  • Address param-nullchecking public API design review #58987
    Area-Compilers
  • Clarify parameters #58985
    Area-IDE
  • Handle AdditiveSpans in either order #58983
    Area-IDE
  • Remove special interpolation brace kinds #58978
    Area-Compilers
  • Use new document formatter to format when a type is moved to a new document #58977
    Area-IDE
  • Update tests to catch the MEF v2 creation failure #58975
    Area-IDE
  • Delete CodeAnalysisRules.ruleset #58968
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix Go To Base for a symbol with a single metadata location #58965
    Area-IDE
  • Seal Equals(obj) on Diagnostic #58961
    Area-Analyzers
  • Use record param docs as property summary docs #58960
    Area-Compilers
  • Introduce Parameter Should Not Try to Introduce on a Parameter #58959
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Fix ParseVBErrorOrWarning #47833
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Add tests for issues fixed by previous PR #58764
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Don't treat SyntaxProvider transform step inputs as cached. #58935
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, Next
  • Disallow null checking discard parameters #58952
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Param Null Checking, Next
  • Update to ICSharpCode.Decompiler 7.1.0.6543 #53304
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Support basic end-to-end scenarios for converting string constants to UTF8 byte representation. #58849
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Cherry Pick 58819 #58970
    Area-IDE
  • Simplify SolutionEventMonitor #58868
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add Analyzers layer to CODEOWNERS #58969
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, Next
  • Port CSharpCodeActions and CSharpFindReferences to the new test harness #58037
    Area-IDE, Next
  • ensure globalconfig files are lowercase #58957
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Infrastructure, IDE-CodeStyle, Next
  • List patterns: Slice value is assumed to be never null #57457
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - List Patterns, Next
  • Add formatting analyzer test for param nullchecking #58936
    Area-Analyzers, Test, Next
  • Move reading HideAdvancedMembers option up #58747
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Enable CA1822 in Visual Studio layer #50569
    Area-IDE, Blocked, Community, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • [EE] Handle ArrayExpansion for 1D array with non-zero lower bounds #58915
    Area-Interactive, Community, 17.2
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #58962
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #58584
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Add additional nested ambiguity note to GetTypeByMetadataName #58854
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add test for nullable value type #58953
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #58941
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Reduce the memory usage of InheritanceMarginTarget #58175
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove unnecessary lock access setting UIContexts in the workspace #58828
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge
  • Revert "Merge pull request #57132 from CyrusNajmabadi/branchId3" #58856
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge
  • Fix race in WorkCoordinator when handling document reanalysis #58820
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #58989
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #58988
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Apply source-build patches #58727
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Export VSTypeScriptFormattingService using a factory instead of directly #58940
    Area-IDE
  • Allow xml docs to still be created when 'emit metadata only' is on. #57667
    Area-Compilers
  • don't include implicit/explicit keywords when completing explicit interface operator #53938
    Area-IDE, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Filter cancellation exceptions in generator driver #58843
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.2
  • Handle AdditiveSpans in either order #58955
    Area-IDE
  • Don't remove cast when converting method group to object #58920
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add a tagger that draws a line to indicate the indentation level of a raw string literal. #58518
    Area-IDE
  • Compiler warning CS8600 message: say possibly null-valued expression #58860
    Area-Compilers
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1563412 #58926
    auto-merge
  • API for getting a deterministic key for a Compilation #57134
    Area-Compilers
  • declaration errors #58507
    Area-Compilers
  • AsyncIterator: clear Current upon exit #58949
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Async Streams
  • Refactor ISyntaxInputNodes #58800
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Add CompilerGeneratedAttribute to record members #58542
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Language Feature - Records
  • SignatureHelp: guess best overload for incomplete invocations #31843
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Backlog
  • [draft] IDE response to raw string literals #58846
    Area-IDE
  • Use interpolated string handler for Contract.ThrowIf methods #58173
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Support live diagnostics in source generated files #58363
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Fix CompilerDiagnostic not being Equal to itself. #58954
    Area-Analyzers, Community
  • BackgroundAnalysisScope enhancements #57172
    Area-Analyzers, Needs UX Triage
  • [semi-auto-props]: Refactor and rename 'AccessingAutoPropertyFromConstructor' #58832
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Razor snippets #58857
    Area-IDE
  • [EnC] Store entire spans instead of line deltas #58831
    Area-Interactive
  • Update source-generators.cookbook.md #58713
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Correctly handle additional inputs to user-defined conversions #58730
    Area-Compilers
  • Retry opening LightBulb when the session is canceled #58947
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add support for implicit inference of `FromServices` for types that appear in DI #39667
  • Disconnect event takes 10 minutes to trigger #39666
  • Twitter OAuth2 support #39664
  • Perf improvement: https #39660
  • SDK Blazor Hot Reload Test Failure `Run_WithHotReloadEnabled_ReadsLaunchSettings_WhenUsingProjectOption` #39657
    7.0-preview1
  • Rename BuildIisNativeProjects -> UpdateIISNativeAssets #39654
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Is it possible to get full path of isolated JS/CSS assets for Blazor #39651
  • Perf regression: mvc #39646
  • Better documentations about blazor dom events #39645

Closed

  • Source build job broken for internal PRs #34127
  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943
  • Confusion using FileExtensionContentTypeProvider Class #39635
  • Standalone (installable) BLAZOR WASM Golden Experience #39653
  • Support binding request body as Stream/ReadOnlySequence<byte> maybe ReadOnlyMemory<byte>/ReadOnlySpan<byte> #38153
    7.0-preview1
  • Ability to run a specific test project on Helix on demand #38537
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Authentication Error with Latest Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authetication.JwtBearer(6.0.1) #39586
  • .net 6 hot reload is rebuilding too much projects after rude edit warning #39648
  • Blazor WebAssembly Localization does not behave the same as Server side #25296
    7.0-preview1
  • DataAnnotation ignored on Record for validation #39631
  • Investigate ref readonly with HPACK and QPACK helper methods #38705
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Remote validation is not working #22549
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor WASM Hot Reload cli not working #38561
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Unable to run ASP.net Core 6.0 Web API on IIS 10 Windows Server 2019 #39452
  • Blazor Download File From Stream Error #39603

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix browser cookie tests to only run with HTTPS #39665
    area-signalr

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-20

Created

Closed

  • [Android] Push notification in MAUI #4173

Created

Merged

    6.0.200-preview.13
  • Added dependency to _CollectHotRestartBundleResources for hiding/unhi… #4185

  • Update .NET installer links to 200 band #4234
  • Remove CarouselPage #4204
  • Button Padding #3575
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.200-preview.13

  • add preview 12 to news #4223

Updated

  • Update IOSWebViewManager.cs #4158
    area/blazor 🕸️, platform/iOS 🍎, s/needs info ❓
  • Implement GoBack, GoForward and Reload methods in WebViewHandler #3316
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.200-preview.13

  • Update Maui Graphics and SkiaSharp #4220

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test: Convert query tests to conditional theory #27229
  • EF Core 6.0 temporal tables - Support specifying precision for PeriodEnd and PeriodStart columns #27228
  • Allow non-nullable struct entity property to be DB optional, if conversion to/from nullable type defined. #27227
  • Collection Navigation Property is not Loading #27226
  • When inserting data, the navigation property is empty and an error will be reported #27225
  • EF Core 6.0 temporal tables - Support specifying HISTORY_RETENTION_PERIOD #27224
  • Cosmos test failure due to line format mismatch #27222

Closed

  • GroupBy debug assert: Missing alias in the list: p1,p #26104
    7.0.0
  • Query: Make ScalarSubqueryExpression fully immutable #26532
    7.0.0
  • .Set<> then .Any() fails after second time with .NET 6.0.100-rc.1.21458.32 / Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.SqlServer 6.0.0-rc.1.21452.10 #26167
    7.0.0
  • 'variable '__p_1' of type 'System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1[FileModel]' referenced from scope '', but it is not defined' #26964
    7.0.0
  • Error with HasConversion in EF.Core.Tools 6.0.1 #27201
  • Deleting entities is having problems #27221

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/2.1] Stop building w/ VS2017 in CI #27233
  • Update branding to preview1 #27232
  • [release/6.0] RevEng: Don't use nameof syntax (#26622) #27231
    Servicing-consider
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #27230
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Merged

  • Query: Mark SelectExpression as immutable after projection has been applied #27011
    auto-merge
  • Query: Don't skip any parameter in projection #27008
    auto-merge
  • [release/6.0] Query: Match joined tables properly when lifting for group by aggregate #27170
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.3
  • Update NorthwindMiscellaneousQueryCosmosTest.cs #27223
    auto-merge

Updated

  • Fix to #26676 - EF Core 6 - IsTemporal adds an unnecessary migration when DefaultSchema is configured at the DbContext Level #27198
  • Add support for index sort order (descending) #27210
  • [release/6.0] Revert change to delete dependent when optional FK with cascade delete is set to null #27216
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.3
